title: "Aphasia research studies"

```{r, echo = F, results = "asis", layout = "l-body-outset"}
library(htmltools)
library(flexdashboard)
library(here)
library(tidyverse)
library(htmltools)

data = read.csv(here("data", "clinical_trials_clean.csv"))%>%
  select(BriefTitle, Condition, StartDate, NCTId,
         OrgFullName, BriefSummary, DetailedDescription,
         Keyword, StudyType, EligibilityCriteria, HealthyVolunteers,
         MinimumAge, Gender, LocationCity, LocationState, lon, lat) %>%
  mutate(BriefTitle = gsub("[.]", "", x=BriefTitle))

study <- function(data_in) {
  name = data_in$BriefTitle[i]
  id = data_in$NCTId[i]
  university = data_in$OrgFullName[i]
    div(
      class = "study",
      h3(class = "name", name),
      div(class = "title", id),
      div(class = "university", university)
    )
}

for(i in 1:length(data)){
  print(br())
  #cat("##", data$BriefTitle[i], "\n") # Create second level headings with the names.
  print(study(data))
}
```
